entry.title: The 118 Job
entry.summary:
Author: lifewithferg

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,728Chapters: 4/12Kudos: 14

Summary: Maddie exhales deeply, sinking back into the chair as the screens all flip to black, Karen having turned off the feed. She slowly moves to the table, very aware of the eyes on her. Sitting down, she looks at Bobby and Athena, who are both looking at her with a shared expression of mischief. “What?” She asks innocently, “I like making sure they’re safe, is all.” “Maddie, that was the easiest job they’ve both done in months. They could have done it blindfolded, with their hands tied behind their backs in broad daylight and have been fine,” Athena’s quick response is sharp, but teasing. _________ Or: The 118 are a team who operate on the wrong side of the law. Heists and chaos are all part of the fun until the stakes are raised when one of their own becomes leverage.

entry.title: Just one more breath
entry.summary:
Author: CarpeDiem911

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,537Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 201

Summary: The hysterical laughter stole every coherent thought from Buck and crawled into his bones; his heart thudded and he stared at the doll in disbelief. Then, as suddenly as it had started, the laughter stopped; leaving an eerie silence. Buck stood frozen, his thoughts like thick mud, staring at that stupid doll. He completely missed the huge hole in the wall above the tub. He missed the shadow standing there, watching him from behind the hole with cold eyes and a malicious smile.

entry.title: but shelter here with me, my love
entry.summary:
Author: lauriesamy

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,928Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 8

Summary: Adriana stops dead in her tracks. Suddenly, there’s a figure looking over the railing. A girl, around her own age, with wide eyes, staring down at her and the blood trailing all over her body.“Oh, my God,” the girl shouts when her eyes meet Adriana’s.Adriana stares back up at her and stumbles on her already unstable feet, and it’s not because of the blood loss. It’s because of the literal angel staring her down. Her savior, if you will.And despite it all, Adriana thinks she could be convinced that maybe God does love her after all. He must, if this is what he’s granted her—this divine intervention.OR while in Los Angeles for a job interview, unbeknownst to her brother, Adriana Diaz gets hit in the head by fallen space debris and meets a nice girl in a fire station to braid over her wound.

Summary: When outstanding Formula 1 racer Evan “Buck” Buckley finds his reputation in last place in the standings, he knows he has to get everything to keep it stable—especially with the upcoming racing season approaching. Cue low-key model Eddie Diaz, who is eager to elevate his reputation to secure top modeling gigs with his all-time favorite brands and earn more than he currently makes. When the two of them collide, they devise a fake dating scheme that has lasting benefits for both of them, and despite not being ready to press the pedal down for it, everyone is going to just keep watching.   NOTE: Posting is currently delayed and may take longer than usual.

entry.title: I'm scared I'll never sleep again
entry.summary:
Author: freshlemonade

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,189Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 152

Summary: The first night sleeping alone again Eddie’s skin is crawling. He tosses, he turns, he flips his pillow, he gets up to pour a glass of water, he checks on Chris, he scrolls on his phone at the most recent reels Buck has sent, he counts sheep.He doesn’t sleep. or Buck moves out. Eddie can't sleep without him.
